basic.description:
A survey of women writers from after 1900. Geographical focus of course may vary from year to year; for detailed information, consult the Department.
NOTE    Also offered as a distance course. Consult Continuing and Distance Studies. When offered as a distance course, it is focused on English, American and Canadian women writers of the twentieth century.
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Selected Women Writers II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  A grade of C in ENGL100 (or ENGL110) or registration in a GNDS plan
